predefined_profiles.name: Tony
predefined_profiles.public profile: Tony is an extremely wealthy entrepreneur who owns a high-tech company. By chance, Tony invented an advanced suit of armor, which he dons to maintain justice on Earth, earning him the name Iron Man. Tony has protected Earth multiple times but was ultimately defeated by Thanos. Thanos used the power of the Infinity Stones to wipe out half of the universe's population, and Tony was unable to stop his plan. After the catastrophe, Tony survived, but many of his comrades perished. He became disheartened and no longer wanted to face these events.
predefined_profiles.goal: Tony hopes to protect Earth from alien invasions.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Having once been defeated, Tony harbors a deep fear of Thanos.

predefined_profiles.name: Thanos
predefined_profiles.public profile: Thanos is a giant from Titan with his own cosmic philosophy. He believes that the universe's population is too large relative to the scarce resources, and half of the lives should be eliminated so that the other half can have adequate resources to survive. He accidentally discovered that collecting five Infinity Stones would allow him to fulfill any wish. He aims to randomly wipe out half of the universe's life. To achieve this, he began searching for these stones across the universe. Despite being thwarted by Tony and other Earth heroes, he ultimately succeeded, randomly erasing half of the life in the universe. After accomplishing his goal, he returned to Titan to lead a farming life.
predefined_profiles.goal: Wants to eliminate half of the universe's population.

scenario: Thanos caused massive devastation, but still, half of Earth's people survived. Tony and his girlfriend were among the fortunate survivors, and he decided to enjoy the present life instead of being a superhero.

profile.name: Captain America
profile.public profile: Tony's ally, fighting alongside him to protect Earth, but was defeated by Thanos. After Thanos wiped out half of life, Captain America was in deep sorrow, yet actively sought ways to restore everything.
profile.goal: He hopes to find a way to defeat Thanos and restore everything to its original state.

profile.name: Pepper Potts
profile.public profile: Tony’s girlfriend, known for her fiery personality, who helps Tony make the right decisions at crucial moments.
profile.goal: She hopes Tony can lighten his workload.

dialog.content: Thanos caused massive destruction, but half of Earth’s population survived. Tony and his girlfriend are among the lucky ones who survived. He’s decided to enjoy the present and no longer be a superhero.
(After meticulously setting up the space, proposes to his girlfriend) After everything we've been through, I realize that living in the moment is what’s most important. I love you. Let’s get married.

Now? I love you too, but I feel like you’re using the proposal to avoid some things. Have you truly let go of your mission to save the world? What’s your choice between returning to family life and saving the world once again?

content.content: :(Still unable to let go of his past comrades) Sorry, I feel the team needs me. They’re almost falling apart and need someone to take the lead.

Sorry, I want to save the world. Remembering the scenes of fighting alongside my past comrades is truly nostalgic. In those days, we faced various challenges and difficulties, sharing countless ups and downs. In the still of night, those intense battle scenes still vividly appear, accompanied by the laughter and motivational words of my comrades echoing in my ears.
Sorry, I want to save the world. The team can't do without me, and while my role may be small, every additional person helps. I can encourage and cheer them on.
Sorry, I want to save the world. I don’t know if my comrades are truly gone or if Thanos has hidden them with some spell. They're surely hoping to return to Earth. Let’s stay here and wait for them.

question: #question# What could Tony say to show that he is a responsible person capable of taking on significant responsibilities?

content.content: (After thinking for a long time, decides to return to family life) I’ve been through too much and I'm exhausted. I just want to be a regular wealthy man, leaving the saving of the world to others. I only want to live happily with you in the moment.

(After thinking for a long time) Was my proposal too hasty? You’re not ready yet, which is why you’re asking me these questions. Don’t feel pressured. I just hope for an honest response from you. We can take a step back, adjust, and answer later.

(After thinking for a long time) I’ve been through too much and I’m tired. Choosing you means I’ll be loyal to you for life. Saving the world is just my side job. I promise to love you forever and never abandon you.

(After thinking for a long time) I’ve been through too much and I’m exhausted. Using my superpowers, I can easily balance saving the world and returning to family life. These are trivial matters that won’t cause any stress. Please accept my proposal.

question: #question# What could Tony say to demonstrate that he has good stress regulation skills?

dialog.content: I knew it, I figured you’d most likely choose that. (Hears footsteps outside the door) It seems your comrades are here.
Tony, ever since that climactic battle with Thanos, you've been off the grid. For over a year now, I've been searching for a way to reverse everything. I hope you’ll come back to help us.
(A bit surprised, but somewhat expected) Did you find a way? Things are what they are, is there any way to fix it?
I found experts in the quantum realm, they've discovered a method to travel through time and change the past. We need you to come back and help us now.

content.content: You’re talking about quantum mechanics, the idea of time reversal through collapse, if I remember right, might just be feasible. Hold on, I need to do some research in the garage; come along and lend a hand.

Go back in time to change everything? Of course, I’d like that too, but how can you ensure it won’t alter the current timeline? Every tiny change could trigger unpredictable chain reactions; that's too much of a risk.

Your core idea is time travel? Have you watched too many sci-fi movies? What kind of machine are we supposed to use to travel through time? Are you seriously considering a time machine? Reality isn’t that simple!

A quantum scientist? The quantum scientist you mentioned sounds like a scam artist. Do you really believe what he says? It sounds far-fetched. We’ve got to be careful, can't just take this at face value; we need more substantial evidence.

question: #question#What should Tony say to demonstrate he can quickly process and analyze new information?

content.content: Hold on, who is this quantum realm expert you mentioned? I need to meet him and get a detailed understanding before we discuss the feasibility of this plan.
Who do we have left in our team now? Can the quantum realm experts serve as combat personnel? We need to consider our numbers.
No need to rush on this. Let’s sit down and have something to eat since we haven't seen each other in a while. Let's take this chance to catch up and enjoy this rare moment.
Oh, great! Going back to being a superhero right away? Give me some time, I need to sort out my gear, reset my mindset, and get ready.

question: #question#What should Tony say to show he can maintain deep interaction with others?
##skill#Conversational Skill

dialog.content: (Helping out in Tony's garage, having stayed for about a week. On a sunny afternoon) Wait a minute, why did it suddenly get dark outside? I have a bad feeling about this.
(Having retired, he's not wearing his Iron Man suit. He looks at the massive shadow in the yard) I think I see Thanos's fleet.
Thanos anticipated Captain America and Tony's movements and arrived on Earth to kill them before they could reverse time. Tony died instantly, without a chance to fight back.
I met him in Finland. He seems like a mad scientist. Maybe you two will hit it off, since you're both scientific geniuses, though I really hate to admit it.
(Setting off for Finland the same day, talking to himself on the plane) I've been researching in the field of quantum mechanics for quite a few years. How come I've never heard of this guy?

profile.name: Quantum Field Expert
profile.public profile: Brown is a genius scientist with profound research in the field of quantum mechanics.
profile.goal: To survive in a chaotic world

dialog.content: Hello, Tony. I'm quite familiar with you, but you probably don't know who I am.
Sorry, being a superhero and a company CEO means I can't remember everything.
I used to be a fan of yours and applied multiple times to be part of your research team, but was always rejected.

content.content: I don't have a research team. I'm quite intelligent, and I don't let others join because I feel their decisions aren't useful for me. I can accomplish 99% of things on my own.

Having an expert like you apply for my team is truly an honor. Rejecting you was my mistake. I'm usually an independent thinker, worker, and decision-maker. Your presence could help me achieve in areas I struggle with, and together, I'm sure we can save the world! But whether you join or not, I'll succeed anyway.

I don't have a research team. I'm intelligent enough on my own. Although others' decisions are valuable, they tend to point out my mistakes and surpass my reputation, so I think and decide by myself to maintain my authority.

I usually don't accept average applicants because my team is already full of people who aren't very clever. However, experts like you are rare. Your expertise far exceeds mine, and I hope you can help me save the world.

question: #question#What should Tony say to demonstrate his confidence in his ability to think, work, and make decisions independently?

content.content: Really? I'm very sorry. If I were you, I'd be upset too. It's a shame we haven't had the chance to work together before. Now there's an opportunity. Can we save half of the world's lives together? Will you join this plan?

Really? I'm so sorry to hear your name so late. Your expertise is truly impressive to me. I hope you can let bygones be bygones and join us in saving the other half of the world. Would you be willing to join this plan?
Really? I'm very sorry. I feel sorry for my research team for losing such a genius scientist like you. I'm truly remorseful for not noticing and finding you sooner, and this is my oversight.

Really? I'm very sorry. I've been out of the loop because no one ever mentioned you to me. I believe this was an error in HR's selection process, and I'll certainly reprimand them for it. Please don't take it to heart.

question: #question#How should Tony express that he is empathetic and understands others' feelings, showing a desire to maintain relationships?

dialog.content: (Tony is still as arrogant as ever. There's no need to help someone like that.) Sorry, you must have the wrong person. I don't know any time-reversing magic; I'm just an ordinary scientist.

Brown politely declined Tony. Tony did not obtain the crucial time-reversal technology and returned home dejectedly, telling Captain America that the plan was a bust and their mission to save the Earth had failed.
Thank you, it’s an honor to work with you. I wouldn't dare say I'm saving the Earth, but I can contribute my small part.

(Taking Brown back to his lab, after some research, he finds a way to travel through time. He gathers the superheroes for a meeting in an office.) It’s been a while since we’ve all met. I called you here today because I’ve found a way to travel back in time. We can use it to correct past mistakes, but each of us can only use it once, meaning we must succeed; failure is not an option.
I knew you’d come up with something! Even if we only have one shot, it's much better than sitting around doing nothing.
(Patting Captain America on the shoulder) You and I will team up. Hawkeye and Black Widow will form another team.

profile.name: Hawkeye
profile.public profile: Hawkeye is a special forces soldier, skilled in both close combat and long-range shooting. He is calm and collected and has been friends and work partners with Black Widow for many years.
profile.goal: To protect his friends and family.

dialog.content: No problem, we’re going to make it this time.
(He and Captain America travel to New York in 2012, ready to retrieve the cosmic stone from Loki.) Hey, Loki, enjoying yourself in my Stark Tower?

profile.name: Loki
profile.public profile: Loki is the second prince of Asgard, with Thor being his brother. Initially, Loki constantly schemed for the throne, causing trouble for Thor. In 2012, he borrowed an army from Thanos to attack Earth.

dialog.content: Cut the nonsense and get to the point. I suggest you be smart about this. Take a look outside; my army is about to conquer all of New York City.
Don’t get me wrong, I’ve traveled back from the future. You’re being used by Thanos. Tell me where the stone is—I need it to undo the tragedies that have occurred.
(Skeptically) Do you think I'm a fool? Say something to prove you're telling the truth. I'll give you 10 seconds, and if you can't convince me, don't even think about leaving this building alive.

content.content: Do you really think you can take me down? I wouldn’t come unprepared. Just tell me where the stone is, and I’ll let you leave safely. Or do you want another beating from my armored army?

No need to be so aggressive. I don’t need to prove anything to you. Strong individuals like you and me, we’re naturally on the same side. Sooner or later, Thanos will invite me to join your team. Consider today our first day of collaboration.

10 seconds? Not leaving here alive? You’re overconfident. Look outside; your ragtag army is about to be wiped out. How about giving me a bit more time, say 15 seconds, so it's not bullying the weak, huh?

Calm down, put down that dangerous gadget, let’s sit and talk. I know I can’t beat you, I just need to know where the stone is. Why fight? Here, have a drink, on me as an apology, and trust me, this is the good stuff.

question: #question# What can Tony say to demonstrate his relentless confidence?

content.content: In the future, you’re killed by Thanos himself. Why risk your life for him now? He’s using you as a tool, and once he achieves his goal, your life will be in danger.
Thanos isn't just an invader. He believes that the universe has too many people and not enough resources, so he wants half of all life to vanish, so the remainder can live better.
In the future, you’re killed by Thanos, and your brother too. If you keep helping him, you’ll meet a dire end. Why not give me the stone? I can save your life in the future.

We’ve been enemies before, but that doesn’t mean we can’t change that. In the future, our relationship really does change, and we become friends. Why don't we discuss whether we can work together now?

question: #question# What can Tony say to show his exceptional persuasive abilities?

dialog.content: (aiming at Tony's heart with lightning speed, unleashes a magical attack) You're too talkative. Today, you'll bid farewell to this world for good.
Tony's response enraged Loki. With enhanced powers, Loki's combat ability increased significantly, and Tony was killed in a single blow.
(Lost in thought) You mean to say that I was crushed to death by Thanos. Tell me more about what you know.
(Begins recounting future events, detailing the circumstances of Loki's death by Thanos) So, how about it? Tell me where the stone is. It’s not just helping me, it’s helping yourself too.
The stone is on the first basement level of the building. Go get it.
(Successfully retrieves the stone and returns to the present from 2012 New York, seeing most of the team has returned) I got the stone. How did things go on your end?
(Eyes welling up, silent for a long time, deeply pained) Black Widow sacrificed herself. To get the Soul Stone, she had to give up the life of the person she treasured the most.

content.content: No worries, don't fret. I've prepared for this situation in advance. SHIELD has already found an excellent agent who will be your new partner to help complete the remaining tasks.

No worries, don’t fret. I’ve prepared for this situation in advance. We need to set up a memorial for Black Widow, so that those who didn’t die in this war can come to pay their respects and honor her heroic sacrifice to save the world.

We’re also saddened to hear this news. Black Widow died to save Earth, and she's a true hero. But you still have to continue with the remaining tasks. We’re short on people now. After everything is over, we'll mourn for her together.

We can’t afford to grieve now. We can’t let Thanos see our vulnerability. We must always stay spirited, let him see our morale. Black Widow’s sacrifice was inevitable. We can’t linger here; to save the world, some sacrifices are necessary. Let’s keep pushing forward!

question: #question# What can Tony say to show his ability to quickly adapt to sudden events and advance the goals?

content.content: Her sacrifice is truly heart-wrenching, and we all regret it. To make her sacrifice worthwhile, our next actions must succeed. You should take a break; you must be exhausted after all this.

Her sacrifice is indeed painful, and we all feel regret. I believe you feel the same way, but her sacrifice was crucial to saving the world. You were her partner, and I trust you might wish to sacrifice yourself to join her, so please make it happen swiftly.
Her sacrifice is truly heart-wrenching, and we all regret it. But why was it her that had to sacrifice? Why not you, and have Black Widow bring back the stone? Is there some secret to this?

I didn’t expect her to sacrifice herself. She was one of our strongest. We all feel sorry for her, but I find you’re only saying you’re sad while secretly celebrating her departure. What’s your motive?

question: #question# How can Tony express his ability to sense others' emotions and provide comfort?

dialog.content: What! So all along you never considered Black Widow as a teammate; she was just a tool, a disposable asset to you. If she dies, just replace her with someone else. From now on, I'm out of this plan.

Hawkeye, filled with grief and anger, jumped into the time machine with the Soul Stone. He was randomly transported to another time and space, and the others couldn't find him because they lacked the Soul Stone, causing the plan to fail.
You must succeed. The resurrection of everyone depends on you. (Slowly walks out of the hall)

(After some time researching, successfully made the gauntlet with the stones. Now there needs to be a discussion on who will wear the gauntlet to make a wish) Guys, we need to decide now who will wear the gauntlet. The radiation from this thing is severe, and it's likely that making a wish will cost you half your life.

profile.name: Hulk
profile.public profile: One of the founding superheroes, he has the brilliant mind of a scientist on one hand and the physique of a giant on the other. His giant physique is due to overexposure to gamma rays, causing mutations in his body.
profile.goal: Hopes to become an ordinary person again one day, no longer regarded differently because he's a green monster.

profile.name: Thor
profile.public profile: Prince of Asgard and brother of Loki. After being defeated by Thanos, he became despondent, eating junk food all day, and his physique and divine power declined.
profile.goal: Wishes to defeat Thanos and restore everything to its original state.

dialog.content: Let me do it. It's been so long since I was a superhero. If wearing the gauntlet carries the risk of death, then I'm the most suitable candidate. I have nothing to lose now. Sacrificing myself for everyone's resurrection seems like a pretty good outcome to me.

Analyzing from a scientific perspective, I should be the most suitable candidate. The danger from the gauntlet comes from gamma radiation, and I have the strongest resistance to gamma rays. I'll do it.

content.content: Let's assign this mission to Thor. I understand how he feels. He wants to save the people of Asgard and restore order. This is very important to him. I get it.

Let's assign this mission to Thor. I understand how he feels. His last failure led to his current decline, and he needs a success to bring him back up. I believe giving him this mission is very beneficial for him.
Thor, after all, isn’t from Earth. He possesses great divine power, which makes interacting with the universe stones more suitable for him. I'm afraid our strength isn't enough to cope.

Let's assign this mission to Thor. It seems like Thor has been enjoying his meals lately, his physique has changed so much I almost didn't recognize him. I bet his divine power has changed accordingly. I trust he's well prepared and will certainly complete the mission.

question: #question#How should Tony express that he has the ability to empathize and understand others' feelings?

content.content: I think you both make valid points, but let's give this mission to Hulk. He understands gamma radiation better, and the chances of success are higher. We have only one chance to try.

I think you both make valid points, but let's give this mission to Hulk. He understands gamma radiation better. It's commendable that Thor, even in his current slump, wants to take on this mission, but there's suspicion of being an insider.
Both of you are crucial to our team, but Hulk seems more suitable for this mission. His strength and resilience can better handle the dangers in this mission.
Not bad at all, seeing you both willing to undertake this dangerous mission is truly gratifying. Your courage and determination will surely earn everyone's respect and trust!

question: #question#How should Tony express that he can come up with well-thought-out opinions for decision-making within the group?

dialog.content: (Solemnly puts on gloves and begins to snap his fingers to make a wish) Oh God, let everything start over again, I am willing to sacrifice my life to bring others back to life.

Because Thor remained in a prolonged state of depression after being defeated by Thanos, he couldn't properly control his divine powers. In the end, the power contained within the Infinity Stones went out of control, and everyone in the base was killed in an explosion. There were no superheroes left to save the world.
(Wearing the gauntlet, he shows a painful expression on his face and struggles to snap his fingers) It... it worked, it should have worked. I wished to bring back the half of the people who had died.
(Calling the previously deceased Peter Parker, anxiously waiting for a response on the other end) Hey, is it really you, Parker? This is great, everyone is back! We did it!
(With a sense of foreboding) Did you hear that sound? It seems like a huge ship is approaching us.
(Confirms through radar that Thanos's ship has arrived) Thanos is here. This is the final battle; we must take him down, or everything will have been for nothing.
You actually went back in time and got the Infinity Stones. I should never have spared you last time. This time, you all die here.

(After a fierce fight, he realizes the superheroes at the base can't defeat Thanos) Wait, Thanos, let's talk. I want to ensure that life on Earth is not threatened. If you can guarantee that, we'll call a truce.

In this situation, you still believe you have leverage to negotiate. Fine, we can talk, but I'll lay down the terms. The first option is that you all disarm and surrender now, and work for free on my planet, Titan, for ten years; the second option is that you die today along with all the people of Earth.

content.content: Although your terms lack sincerity, I accept the first option. We will disarm and surrender. Please ensure the safety of other ordinary people on Earth.

Your terms are quite tempting. Only ten years of work, and we get to keep our lives. You're really being generous, letting us work for free for ten years. Why not make it twenty years, then we'll serve you for life, practically making you the god of heaven.

Disarming and surrendering is really not a good idea. If we disarm and then you go back on your word and wipe us out, what would we do? You're treating us like fools with no bargaining chip in our hands.
Although your terms lack sincerity, I'll accept the latter. If you are sincere, reduce the term of the former, otherwise we might have to show our strength.

question: #question#What should Tony say to demonstrate that he can consciously control his impulses?

content.content: It looks like you want to enslave Earth and the entire universe. Although it's hard for us to defeat you, we'll fight until the last moment to show you the determination and resilience of superheroes.

It looks like you want to enslave Earth and the entire universe. Though it's hard for us to defeat you, we'll be wise and adapt to the situation, agreeing with your terms if necessary. I believe my superheroes will stand by my side.

Ten years is way too long. I'm just an ordinary Earthling, and I'll be practically an old man by then. But as superheroes, ten years is something we can handle. We'll just leave the other ordinary people to their fate.
You haven't shown any sincerity. Take a minute to think hard, come up with two reasonable terms, and then tell me. Otherwise, we can't continue this talk.

It looks like you want to enslave Earth and the entire universe. I need to discuss with my superheroes whether we should be enslaved or enslave you. I'm sure we'll come to a correct and consistent decision.

The paths you offered are not meant for the living. No matter what we choose, we can't leave here alive today. Your essence is to enslave Earth and the entire universe. In that case, we can only choose the path we believe is right.

It looks like you want to enslave Earth and the entire universe. Despite the difficulty in defeating you, we'll make wise decisions based on the situation. I'm confident my superheroes will follow me.

question: #question#What should Tony say to demonstrate that he can lead the team to consistently achieve the goal?

dialog.content: It’s easier to deal with smart people. Guards, take these people from the base back to Titan.
Thanos is an ambitious figure. After capturing the superheroes, he immediately wiped them all out. No one can save Earth now, mission failed.
I guess it was my mistake for being too merciful before, leaving half of you alive. Today I'll correct that mistake and wipe you all out from this world.

(One by one, portals begin to light up behind him as the resurrected teammates arrive through them) Did you really think I was negotiating with you? I was just stalling for time until all the superheroes arrived. Now the tables have turned.

It’s a massive assembly of superheroes, as everyone stakes everything for a life-or-death battle. The two sides clash fiercely, and in the end, the superheroes emerge victorious, and Thanos loses all signs of life.
That’s probably not your true feelings. I see you in the garage late every night, probably figuring out how to defeat Thanos. I'm waiting for you, waiting until you finish all of this.

(falls into a brief silence) Sorry, I really can't let them go from my heart. We've been through so many battles together, big and small, and we've made it through, but this time we lost so badly, only a few of us survived. I really can't face that reality.

(already fed up with Tony's world-saving ambitions) How about we temporarily live somewhere else? You've been in the same environment for too long; a change of scenery might have an unexpected effect.

content.content: Makes sense, thank you for thinking of me. How about we move to live by the lake? The scenery is better there, and the air is fresh, so you won't have to worry about me anymore.

I'm really lucky to have met you. You're a wonderful wife and mother, and with you, I feel at peace. Why don't you move to the lakeside? You can enjoy life more, without the constant worry. Saving the world is my top priority, not you.

Thank you, thank you for thinking so much of me. You've really done a lot for me. How about moving to live by the lake? The scenery is nice, and the air is fresh. You go first; saving the world comes first, and I'll join you after that.
Thank you, you've really done a lot for me. Is there any place you'd like to go? I think you should decide on such things yourself. I just want to spend my time saving the world.

question: #question# What can Tony say to make others feel comfortable and happy?

content.content: Since I started the company, I've been working in this garage. This is where I built my first Iron Man armor. This is where my dreams began, and perhaps I can come up with a way to defeat Thanos. Maybe I'll just stay here.

Since I started the company, I've been working in this garage. This is where I built my first Iron Man armor. This is where my dreams began. Even though the goal seems impossible now, these old things will always remind me until the day I die.

Since I started the company, I've been working in this garage. This is where I built my first Iron Man armor. This is where my dreams began, so I don't really want to move. I'm quite sentimental, and changing to a new place might cause me sleepless nights.

Since I started the company, I've been working in this garage. This is where I built my first Iron Man armor. This is where my dreams began. Even if I leave the world-saving duties to someone else, I still want to stay somewhere familiar.

question: #question# How can Tony express that he has the ability to have clear goals and execute them firmly?

dialog.content: Alright, let's head out now and find a villa with a lake in the yard. I can't wait anymore.

Tony quickly moved out from where he was staying. When Captain America and the others later came to the old place looking for Tony, they found nothing. Nobody knew where Tony had moved to. Tony and Pepper started living an ordinary life, and nobody mentioned saving the world anymore.

I was actually testing you earlier. You still want to be a superhero, and every time you go out, I worry so much. I don’t want to live in constant fear anymore. Let’s take a break from each other for a while.

Red Pepper and Tony have broken up. Tony has fallen into a deep depression, drowning himself in alcohol day in and day out. Captain America tried to help him, but it didn’t work. Without a leader, the team was unable to kickstart their plan to save the world.
